function.name: humidity_decrease
function.description: This function is used to lower the humidity level of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to lower the humidity level.

ration.description: The percentage value to decrease the humidity by.

humidityDelta.description: The amount by which to decrease the humidity.
